home.description: Unlock the perfect path with handpicked courses to master the art of programming.

beginner.name: Beginner
beginner.description: The perfect starting point for those new to programming. Learn the fundamentals and build your first application.

logic.title: Learn Programming Logic
logic.description: Before diving into code, itâ€™s important to understand how to solve problems logically. Study concepts like variables, loops, and conditions.

dataStructures.title: Familiarize Yourself with Simple Data Structures
dataStructures.description: Learn about arrays, lists, and dictionaries (or objects), which are fundamental for organizing and processing data in programming.

algorithms.title: Understand Algorithm Concepts
algorithms.description: Study common algorithms, such as sorting and searching, which are widely used in real-world problem-solving.

webDevelopment.title: Learn Basic Web Development
webDevelopment.description: Familiarize yourself with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to understand how web pages work and are built.

git.title: Master Version Control with Git
git.description: Git is an essential tool for any programmer. Learn to version your code and share projects on GitHub.

frontEnd.name: Front-End
frontEnd.description: Learn to create beautiful, responsive user interfaces with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, mastering visual development.

backEnd.name: Back-End
backEnd.description: Build robust servers, efficient APIs, and manage databases using languages like Node.js, Python, or Java.

fullStack.name: Full-Stack
fullStack.description: Become a complete developer, able to work on both front-end and back-end, building full applications from start to finish.

database.name: Database
database.description: Understand how to design, manage, and optimize relational and NoSQL databases, essential for any modern application.

ai.name: Artificial Intelligence
ai.description: Dive into the fascinating world of AI and machine learning, learning to create intelligent models and solutions.
